title: 1.1465 STATE BEE.
text:
The rusty patched bumble bee, Bombus affinis, is the official bee of the state of Minnesota.
A photograph of the rusty patched bumble bee must be preserved in the Office of the Secretary of State.

==: Office of the Secretary of State

examples.photo_location: Office of the Secretary of State
Office of the Secretary of State

variables.name: bee_name
variables.description: The name of the bee species.

variables.name: state
variables.description: The state in which the bee is recognized.

variables.name: official_status
variables.description: The official status of the bee in the state.

variables.name: photo_location
variables.description: The location where the photograph of the bee is preserved.

consequences: The rusty patched bumble bee is recognized as the official bee of Minnesota and its photograph is preserved in the Office of the Secretary of State.
